alert.note: Alert for Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 3:27PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN BRAZORIA AND EAST CENTRAL MATAGORDA COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM CST... At 327 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Sargent, or 8 miles southeast of Sweeny, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Jackson, Angleton, Freeport, Clute, Sweeny, Surfside Beach, Richwood, Brazoria, Jones Creek, Oyster Creek, Holiday Lakes, Bailey`s Prairie, Sargent, and Wild Peach Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
